variantrule.name: Aegis
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, the next attack roll made against you automatically misses. The {@variantrule Boon|GW2} then ends.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 stack of {@variantrule Burning|GW2} for 1 round, dealing damage equal to twice the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Alacrity
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you have advantage on initiative rolls and your initiative count is increased by your PB at the start of the round.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Bleeding
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A bleeding creature takes slashing damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of slashing damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Vigor|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Blindness
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, the next attack roll you make automatically misses. The {@variantrule Condition|GW2} then ends.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Fury|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Boon
entries: {@variantrule Effect|GW2}
Boons are beneficial {@variantrule Effect|GW2|effects} with a set duration applied by various features.
They are the opposite of {@variantrule Condition|GW2|Conditions}
Each Boon has an associated {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, which it can be corrupted into or converted from.
If a creature already under the effect of a Boon receives the same Boon again, one of two outcomes occurs, depending on the Boon’s properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Boon’s duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.

{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Boon’s effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration. If one instance of the Boon becomes corrupted, all active instances become corrupted. Any {@variantrule condition|GW2} imposed by the corruption is applied only once.

variantrule.name: Burning
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A burning creature takes fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of fire damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Aegis|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Chilled
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, your speed is reduced by 66% and you have disadvantage on initiative rolls and your initiative count is decreased by your PB at the start of the round.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Alacrity|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Crippled
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, your speed is reduced by 50%.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Swiftness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Condition
entries: {@variantrule Effect|GW2}
Conditions are detrimental {@variantrule Effect|GW2|effects} with a set duration applied by various features.
They are the opposite of {@variantrule Boon|GW2|Boons}
Each Condition has an associated {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, which it can be converted into or corrupted from.
If a creature already under the effect of a Condition receives the same Condition again, one of two outcomes occurs, depending on the Condition’s properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Condition’s duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.

{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Condition’s effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration. If one instance of the Condition becomes converted, all active instances become converted. Any {@variantrule Boon|GW2} imposed by the conversion is applied only once.

variantrule.name: Confusion
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A confused creature takes psychic damage at the start of each of its turns and each time it takes an action.
The amount of psychic damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Resolution|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Distortion
entries: {@variantrule Effect|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, you are immune to all damage and automatically succeed on all saving throws.
Stacks duration (max 1 round).

variantrule.name: Effect
entries: Effects are beneficial or detrimental effects with a set duration applied by various features.
If a creature already under the effect of an Effect receives the same Effect again, one of two outcomes occurs, depending on the Effect’s properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Effect’s duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.
{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Effect’s effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration.

variantrule.name: Fear
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, you can’t willingly move closer to the source of the {@variantrule Condition|GW2} and must use the Dash action to move away from it on your turn, if possible.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Stability|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Fury
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit is reduced by 5.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Blindness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Immobilized
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, your speed is 0.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Resistance|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Might
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you add 1 to all damage rolls.
Stacks Intensity (Max 25).
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Weakness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Poison
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A poisoned creature takes poison damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of poison damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
While you are under this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, you regain only two-thirds of the hit points you would normally heal.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Protection
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take from non-{@variantrule Condition|GW2} sources by an amount equal to your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage).
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 3 stacks of {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for 2 rounds.

variantrule.name: Quickness
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you gain one additional action on your turn. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Utilize action.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Slow|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Regeneration
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, at the start of your turn, if you have at least 1 hit point, you regain hit points equal to your PB.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 stack of {@variantrule Poison|GW2} for 2 rounds, dealing damage equal to the half the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Resistance
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you are immune to {@variantrule Blinded|GW2}, {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}, {@variantrule Crippled|GW2}, {@variantrule Fear|GW2}, {@variantrule Immobilized|GW2}, {@variantrule Slow|GW2}, {@variantrule Taunt|GW2}, {@variantrule Weakness|GW2}, and {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2}.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Resolution
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take from {@variantrule Condition|GW2|conditions} by an amount equal to your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage).
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 3 stacks of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, dealing damage equal to the half the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Revealed
entries: {@variantrule Effect|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, you cannot gain the {@variantrule Stealth|GW2} {@variantrule Effect|GW2} or the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition.
Stacks duration (max 5 rounds).

variantrule.name: Stability
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you are immune to {@variantrule Fear|GW2}, {@variantrule Taunt|GW2}, {@condition Prone|XPHB}, and getting moved against your will.

Each time you would be {@variantrule Fear|GW2|Feared}, {@variantrule Taunt|GW2|Taunted}, knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}, or moved against your will you instead remove 1 stack of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}.
Stacks intensity (Max 25).
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Fear|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Stealth
entries: {@variantrule Effect|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, you gain the effects of the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition.
The effect ends if you deal damage or force a creature to make a saving throw.
Stacks duration (max 1 minute).

variantrule.name: Superspeed
entries: {@variantrule Effect|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, your speed is increased by 100%.
Stacks duration (max 3 rounds).

variantrule.name: Swiftness
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, your speed is increased by 33%.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Crippled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Taunt
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, you must move closer to the source of the {@variantrule Condition|GW2} and must use the Dash action to move toward it on your turn, if possible.
If you are already within 5 feet of the source, you must use your action to make an unarmed strike against the source.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Stability|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Torment
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A tormented creature takes necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of necrotic damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
The damage gets doubled if the creature did not move on its last turn.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 3 stacks of {@variantrule Might|GW2} for 2 rounds.

variantrule.name: Vigor
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you gain a bonus to your AC and Dexterity saving throws equal to your PB.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 2 stacks of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} for 2 rounds, dealing damage equal to the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Slow
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, on your turn, you can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both. If you take the Attack action, you can make only one attack regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
Stacks Duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 1 round of {@variantrule Quickness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Vulnerability
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, you take 1 additional damage whenever you take damage.
Stacks intensity (Max 25).
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 1 round of {@variantrule Protection|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Weakness
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, you have a 50% chance of dealing half damage when you roll damage.

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, you gain a malus to your AC and Dexterity saving throws equal to the PB of the creature who inflicted this {@variantrule condition|GW2}.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 3 stack of {@variantrule Might|GW2} for 2 rounds.
